about: Highly motivated seasoned software engineer with 14 years of rich experience in web software development in the most successful companies, such as Badoo, Currency Solutions, Topface and StarLine and so on.
requirements: I require a sponsorship for a new role in the UK (Tier 2 General Visa)

experiences.title: Senior Frontend Developer
duties: Development architecture for web projects
Optimization applications' performance for browsers and mobile devices
Development new React and AngularJS components and support current projects
Refactoring legacy code of current projects
Code review, interview candidates
and so on

experiences.title: Senior PHP Developer
experiences.description: Badoo is the largest dating network in the world. With 370 million users across 190 countries and 450 employees worldwide, Badoo provides the best technology for people to meet, because happiness is better shared. Each day more than 400,000 people sign up for a Badoo experience; users send over 350 million messages and 10 million photos are added to the Badoo platform. Users spend an average of 1.8 hours daily on the Badoo experience, for a total of over 12 billion swipes per day.
duties: Backend supporting and development of user profiles, photos, user verification service, external and private projects of the company.
DB architecture design, highload optimization, testing, code review and so on.
Development of proxy service for avoiding connections blocks.
Implementation A/B testing, new features, GDPR.
Optimization and testing of code, review and so on.

experiences.title: Senior PHP / JavaScript Developer
experiences.description: Currency Solutions is a rather large Foreign Exchange firm, that unlike other companies, that usually handle both smaller and larger payments, focuses only on large transfers.
duties: Front-end development (JavaScript + React) for a service of global money transfer.
Backend development for the money transfer service, REST API, DB architecture, highload optimization, testing, code review and so on.
Support and development CRM system of the company.

experiences.title: Senior PHP Developer
experiences.description: Topface is world famous social network for datings with more than 90 million users. Development for highload: ~90rps, ~1.5 mln users daily.
duties: Development of the user's activity system structure  and DB architecture (such as messages, sympathies, gifts and so on) to increase stability, safety, speed, failover and highload.
The development of the intellectual system for counting user's activity, with automatic recalculation in case of failures.
The implementation A/B testing, and monetization experiments.
Backend development for highload, DB architecture, DB architecture, testing, code review

experiences.title: Senior PHP / JavaScript Developer
experiences.description: StarLine is a service for transport monitoring and remote alarms, and sensors control.
duties: Backend and frontend development
Development for highload
Development of algorithms for tracks analysis
Team php & js lead
Interview candidates for vacancies of the company

experiences.title: Full Stack Web Developer
experiences.description: M2C ltd is the largest provider of Internet, digital television and telephony in Murmansk.
duties: Development and maintenance of internal & external services of the company
Integration billing with external payment systems
Development web-service for control under digital television
Development of advertising management system
Development and design of database architecture
Flash Application Development
Work under new TV channel

projects.title: Game "Mazay Mahjong and bunnies"
description: It is my personal project, that I made in free time.

I designed a game concept, elements, levels, music. I analyzed the game logic and a user behavior, edited a design of the game, designed a system architecture for highload, and wrote front-end and back-end code. Also, I made a server configuration and software.

awards.title: I have got 2 years in row License Certificate from JetBrains for the contribution and development to open source PHP projects
description: In 2018 and 2019 JetBrains Company provided me License Certificate for JetBrains All Products Pack for the contribution and development to open source PHP projects .
